name: Circle Pong (itch) (Eeewani)
description:
Circle Pong

Move your paddle around in a circle to hit the ball and keep it on screen!

As you survive longer and longer you'll get more points for your hits. However, be careful, the more you hit the ball the more it'll speed up!

To help you (or hurt you) on your way, powerups will change the game and can make or break a new high-score!

Good Luck!
